Reviews.Title: “Unpleasant staff, no room service! How is it 4* hotel?”
Reviews.Author: Dulcinea_del_Tob0s0
Reviews.Content: hotel looks nice reception reasonable soon found scenes hotel spent deal money look nice providing technology doors arrival greet hello welcome passports card explain assuming meant understand flash card front panel wall door regard technologically backwards impressed innovation unimpressed failing tell detail controls air conditioningheating set 4c outside air coming cold reception response winter sir thats cold winter night tired decided service told downstairs coffee machine italy cmon breakfast details consisted boiled eggs questionable bits meat cheese slices plastic laid trays plus abovementioned coffee machine reported left pair trousers realised exit didnt time collect due plane leaving 2 attempts finally confirmed address details 2 weeks ago written 3 times confirmation responded am treating theft answer begs questions 4 hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location for sightseeing in Venice”
Reviews.Author: joani1806
Reviews.Content: hotel clean modern easy travel venice bus 10 minute bus ride venice night drove venice cost 24 euros car parking garage clean beds wifi breakfast hot eggs type meat look appetizing found front desk staff impatient somewhat rude bothering remember travelling directions responded quickly werent understood

Reviews.Title: “very clean and modern hotel”
Reviews.Author: dido50
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel found base visiting short walk bus train station 15min transport value money hotel clean modern complaint glass wall bedroom revealed shower toilet bad couples bit privacy toileti expressed dislike hotel receptionist strange listened day suitable left day beautiful found strange maybe england breakfast nice eat little visit hotelwe paid price value money

Reviews.Title: “this hotel is not a 4 star and there is nothing to do in the vicinity”
Reviews.Author: 1knowing1
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel following cruise march 2011 picture travelocitycom looked ok trusted instead doing complete research venice city romance etc hotel location pits clean shower bit bathroom ok drab scenery worse 212 rating result internet access 3 star

Reviews.Title: “Great Location , super clean, easy to get to the heart of Venice...”

Reviews.Content: spent night awaiting cruise hotel currently undergoing building sunday affect close venice mestre train station short 1015 minute train ride st lucia venice station costs 1 euro mestre head marghera sidethe continental breakfast comprehensive wifi access available charge bedroom looked exactly photos website evenings restaurant set meal 15 euros recommend restaurant hundered metres road roundabout capri
